S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-3791: Excessive memory usage when fetching small Clobs. Exploits length information (where available) to reduce memory overhead wrt buffering. This improvement will only affect small Clobs in the range 1 byte to 8 KB, the smaller the Clob the bigger the overhead reduction. Patch file: derby-3791-2a-buffer-adjustments.diff
